Class StorageEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2103.storage.StorageEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StorageInterface

    public class StorageEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements StorageInterface
    This class implements StorageInterface Using iCal4j to read and store iCalendar file complying RFC 2445 iCalendar specification
